statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT payment_details FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customer_info WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUBSTRING(customer_name, 1, 5) AS short_name, LENGTH(address) AS address_length FROM customer_info WHERE LENGTH(address) > 20 ORDER BY address_length ASC, short_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_details FROM customer_info WHERE payment_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, price FROM item ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount, transaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT item_name, item_description, price FROM item WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM item WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100.00 AND 500.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM Transaction WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transaction GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transaction GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE zip_code LIKE '90%';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_revenue FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.order_id GROUP BY p.product_name, p.price ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, SUM(p.amount) AS total_payments FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.first_name, c.last_name HAVING total_payments > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000;
SELECT street_address, city, state, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 1000.00
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id
